pages.text: $(li)Tired of not being able to show off your Skin without taking off your armor and sacrificing protection?$(br)$(li)Don't worry! We have a solution to that!$(br)$(li)First, open your inventory, and look in your 3d model character.

pages.title: Cosmetic Armor
pages.text: Now click in the Shirt button located on the right down corner.

pages.title: Cosmetic Armor
pages.text: After click this icon, you will see four slots. Once slot for every part of your armor.

$(li)You can just click in the checkboxes in the top left corner of every slot to stop showing your armor, and click again to show it again.$(br)$(li)If you want to show a different piece of armor than the one you have equipped, just place the desire piece of armor in the correct slot.
